articles.description: All the goals and reaction from this week's Champions League fixtures as Liverpool win, Aston Villa and Celtic draw.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Reaction to this week's Champions League as Liverpool go top

articles.description: Shoaib Bashir takes 4-69 as England chip away at the New Zealand batting on the opening day of the first Test in Christchurch.
articles.title: England in New Zealand: Shoaib Bashir takes four wickets on first day

articles.description: Arne Slot's Liverpool machine hits top gear to outclass Real Madrid and show something special is stirring at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-0 Real Madrid: 'Something special brewing at Slot's incredible Reds'

articles.description: Real Madrid record a third loss in the Champions League as Kylian Mbappe struggles to impress, are they really at risk of being eliminated?
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe 'hasn't delivered when Madrid needed him' - could Real Madrid be set for Champions League exit?

articles.description: While former Borussia Dortmund star Jude Bellingham was enduring a torrid Champions League night at Anfield, another Englishman currently at the Bundesliga club was lighting up the competition.
articles.title: Jamie Gittens: Young English winger scores another great Champions League goal for Borussia Dortmund

articles.description: Manchester City's injured midfielder Rodri says he wants to return to action to help his team-mates before the end of the season.
articles.title: Rodri: Man City midfielder targets injury return before end of season

articles.description: Coventry City appoint ex-Chelsea and England midfielder Frank Lampard as their head coach, following Mark Robins' sacking.
articles.title: Frank Lampard: Coventry City appoint ex-England midfielder

articles.description: Jermaine Eluemunor discovered American football by accident while growing up in London. It was an accident that changed his life.
articles.title: NFL Thanksgiving: Jermaine Eluemunor on his journey from London to the New York Giants

articles.description: Move aside premium assets, it's the week of the budget forward as Thomas Woods goes leftfield and picks Brighton striker Joao Pedro as his captain.
articles.title: FPl gameweek 13 tips and team of the week: Joao Pedro, Marcus Rashford and Matheus Cunha come in

articles.description: As England prepare to defend their European Championship title next year, who will Sarina Wiegman pick? Steph Houghton and Fara Williams give their assessment.
articles.title: Lionesses at Euro 2025: Who makes England starting line-up and who misses out?
